name: div
features: Optimal Compression: Provides light, premium compression to boost blood flow, enhancing performance & recovery
Reduce Injury: Damps muscle vibrations during throwing to help prevent injuries & support arm health
UVA Protection: Offers UPF 50+ sun protection to shield against harmful UVA & UVB rays
Lightweight + Moisture Wicking: Breathable, moisture-wicking fabric keeps players cool & dry on the field
2 Pack: Includes two sleeves for dual-arm wear or as a backup for long game days
Secure Fit: Thick elastic band with silicone grip ensures a snug fit that stays in place during play
